Playing for like the 7th time. Love the series. Highly recommend it.

A new achievement for a 13 year old game. Seriously? I dont care that it unlocks on startup but i have to reinstall the game and thats 10gigabyte and i have not very fast internet. I was actually hoping Valve would finally put an end to developers adding achs to their old games but now i must see they do it themselves. Thats just stupid IMO

Episode 2 was similar yet different to every other half life game, and i loved it. It was more emotional took more try's to pass and was just a great experiance, if u havent played it yet plz do its allot of fun.
gnomesby will live in space now

I used to have all the achievements in this game, and now I don't because Gabe decided that he's gonna do a reference to this game and send a garden gnome to space and Valve decided to add an achievement to this game to commemorate this event. Good bit, Gabe!

If my achievement related plight doesn't matter to you and you just want to know what people think about the game, then it's pretty good.
